Simone Martini ( c. 1284  1344) was an Italian painter born in Siena. He was a 
major figure in the development of early Italian painting and greatly influenced 
the development of the International Gothic style. It is thought that Martini was a 
pupil of Duccio di Buoninsegna, the leading Sienese painter of his time. ...
